data.text:
Lydia Fox is a British-born stage actress, television personality and filmmaker who comes from the distinguished Robin Fox family. They are well-known entertainers who have achieved tangible success in the showbiz industry. Lydia Fox, like some of her family members, has achieved some success in the theaters and big screens with a number of plays and films. She is the beloved wife of Richard Ayoade, one of Britain’s most popular multi-talents. Here’s everything you need to know about this stage and screen diva.

Lydia Fox Biography

Lydia Fox, now known by her marriage name LydiaAyoade, was born sometime in 1979, the actual day and month of her birth is not yet known. However, the beautiful Lydia Fox was born in Leeds, Yorkshire, England, United Kingdom.

While there’s a lack of information regarding her childhood, as a child of entertaining parents, you’d expect her to have had exposure to the showbiz industry and all the razzmatazz that comes with the camera and the spotlight from an early age.

The Leeds born after her high school education enrolled at Newnham College, a women’s faculty at the University of Cambridge. Unfortunately, her major and year of graduation are not publicly available.

Her acting career began before she graduated from university. Lydia Fox’s recording shows that while she was a student in 2001, she played a nonchalant version of Juliet in a Marlowe Society production of Romeo and Juliet , opposite Tom Hiddleston.
